item.title: 印度酝酿 10 亿美元补贴计划以促进太阳能制造
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度正在敲定一项 10 亿美元的资本补贴计划，以支持其太阳能制造业，这也是印度为减少对中国的依赖并从全球能源转型中获利而做出的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：India is finalizing a $1 billion capital subsidy plan to bolster its solar manufacturing industry, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as part of a wider effort to reduce dependence on China and profit from the global energy transition.】

item.title: 中国学会拥抱美国遗忘的东西：创造性毁灭的美德
item.description:
在北京，竞争是主流。而在华盛顿，情况就不一样了。【原文：

In Beijing, competition is in. In Washington, not so much.

item.description:
国防开支将进一步推动股市上涨，但新政府已经接到通知。【原文：

】

item.title: 英国石油公司（BP）还剩最后一搏
item.description:
我曾警告说，公司的时间已经不多了。如果董事会不迅速改变方向，投资者的反抗就会接踵而至。【原文：

I warned that the company was on borrowed time. An investor revolt could ensue if the board doesn’t change direction — fast. 

】

item.title: 特斯拉欧洲销量下降 45%，竞争对手电动汽车注册量激增
item.description: 特斯拉公司上个月在欧洲的销售额骤降 45%，竞争对手汽车制造商在欧洲的电动汽车需求激增。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s sales plunged 45% last month across Europe, where rival carmakers saw a surge in electric-vehicle demand.】

item.title: 欧洲电动汽车销量飙升 37%，汽车制造商要求更宽松的二氧化碳法规
item.description: 欧洲电动汽车的销量上个月猛增了 37%，原因是汽车制造商为遵守今年更严格的排放法规而大力推广其电池动力汽车。【原文：Europe’s electric-vehicle sales jumped 37% last month as automakers promote their battery-powered cars in order to comply with tighter emissions regulation this year.】

item.title: 匈牙利将在马托尔斯时代结束时维持关键利率不变：决策指南
item.description: 匈牙利准备在央行行长 Gyorgy Matolcsy 执掌央行 12 年后主持的最后一次政策会议上维持关键利率不变。【原文：Hungary is poised to keep its key interest rate unchanged at the last policy meeting chaired by Governor Gyorgy Matolcsy after 12 years at the central bank’s helm.】

item.title: 印尼国家石油公司官员因涉嫌 120 亿美元贪污案被拘留
item.description: 印尼总检察长逮捕了国家能源公司印尼国家石油公司（PT Pertamina）子公司的高管，他们涉嫌卷入一起涉及原油和石油产品采购的 193.7 万亿卢比（约合 119 亿美元）的腐败丑闻。【原文：Indonesia’s attorney general has arrested executives from subsidiaries of state energy firm PT Pertamina in an alleged 193.7 trillion rupiah ($11.9 billion) corruption scandal involving the procurement of crude and oil products.】

item.title: 特斯拉向中国驾驶员推出期待已久的 FSD 功能
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）已开始向中国客户推出软件更新，以实现与美国全自动驾驶类似的驾驶辅助功能。【原文：Tesla Inc. has started rolling out a software update for customers in China that enables driver-assistance capabilities similar to those marketed as Full Self-Driving in the US.】

item.title: 塔塔资本批准印度首次公开募股计划
item.description: 塔塔资本有限公司（Tata Capital Ltd. ）隶属于从盐到软件的塔塔集团（Tata Group），该公司正计划进行首次公开募股，其中包括新股发行和部分现有股东的出售要约。【原文：Tata Capital Ltd., part of the salt-to-software Tata Group, is planning to go for an initial public offering that will include a mix of new shares and an offer of sale by some existing shareholders.】

item.title: 交易员称中国科技股暴跌带来买入机会
item.description: 一些交易商认为，在唐纳德-特朗普总统采取行动挤压美国对亚洲国家的投资后，中国科技股的下跌提供了一个买入机会。【原文：A decline in Chinese technology stocks after President Donald Trump moved to squeeze US investments into the Asian nation presents a buying opportunity, according to some traders.】

item.title: 中国紧张局势加剧引发风险厌恶情绪，金属下跌
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普限制中国投资的举动破坏了市场情绪，包括铝和铜在内的金属出现下跌，原材料与当地股市一同下跌。【原文：Metals including aluminum and copper declined as moves by US President Donald Trump to restrict Chinese investments undermined market sentiment, with raw materials losing ground along with local equities.】

item.title: 日本芯片股因美国对华更严格限制的报道而下滑
item.description: 据说美国官员正计划对中国半导体行业实施更严厉的管制，包括东京电子有限公司在内的日本芯片设备制造商的股票跌幅扩大。【原文：Shares of Japanese chip equipment makers including Tokyo Electron Ltd. extended losses after US officials were said to be planning tougher controls on China’s semiconductor industry.】

item.title: 卡尼和弗里兰在辩论中角逐谁能成为特朗普最强硬的对手
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）是加拿大下一任总理竞选中的领跑者，在一场法语电视辩论中，他首次与主要竞争对手克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）交锋，辩论的焦点是如何应对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统。【原文：Mark Carney, the front-runner in the race to become Canada’s next prime minister, squared off for the first time with his main rival Chrystia Freeland in a French-language TV debate that focused on how to handle President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 中电将把资金重点投向香港和中国大陆，推进清洁电力发展
item.description: 中电控股有限公司计划将投资重点放在香港和中国大陆，而其他地区的项目则需要自筹资金，因为该公司正在寻求更环保的发电组合。【原文：CLP Holdings Ltd. plans to focus on investing in Hong Kong and mainland China, while projects in other areas will need to be self-funded as the utility seeks a greener power generating portfolio.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：分析师称特斯拉进军印度可能不会影响当地企业发展
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特朗普团队寻求加强拜登对中国的芯片控制
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府正在勾画更严厉的美国半导体限制措施，并向主要盟国施压，要求它们加强对中国芯片业的限制，这是美国新总统计划扩大乔-拜登（Joe Biden）时期开始的限制中国政府技术实力的努力的早期迹象。【原文：Donald Trump’s administration is sketching out tougher versions of US semiconductor curbs and pressuring key allies to escalate their restrictions on China’s chip industry, an early indication the new US president plans to expand efforts that began under Joe Biden to limit Beijing’s technological prowess.】

item.title: 伍德赛德公司表示，碳信用额是遏制排放的必要条件
item.description: 伍德赛德能源集团有限公司（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）认为碳信用额仍可发挥作用，因为解决难以消减的排放预计需要成本。【原文：Woodside Energy Group Ltd. sees a continued role for carbon credits because of the projected costs of tackling difficult-to-abate emissions.】

item.title: 韩国做空禁令即将结束，Pictet 考虑采取多空策略
item.description: 一旦韩国按计划恢复卖空，Pictet 资产管理公司就计划买入更多韩国股票，以对冲其股票多头头寸。【原文：Pictet Asset Management plans to buy more South Korean stocks once a planned resumption of short-selling in the nation allows it to hedge its long equity positions.】

item.title: 特朗普命令引发地缘政治风险，中国科技股暴跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普采取行动进一步挤压美国对亚洲国家的投资后，中国科技股出现下滑，这表明世界上最大的两个经济体之间的金融和技术脱钩正在加深。【原文：Chinese technology stocks slumped after President Donald Trump moved to further squeeze US investments into the Asian nation, in a sign of deepening financial and technological decoupling between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 希尔豪斯寻求为床垫制造商的 8 亿美元贷款再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Hillhouse 投资公司正在与银行洽谈，为其收购中国床垫制造商 AI Dream 的 8 亿美元贷款进行再融资。【原文：Hillhouse Investment is in talks with banks to refinance an $800 million loan that backed its acquisition of Chinese mattress maker AI Dream, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼债券计划引发对治理和货币化的担忧
item.description: 印尼银行计划购买政府发行的债券，为其雄心勃勃的住房计划提供资金，这引发了人们对国家债务管理的更多担忧。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s plan to buy bonds that will be issued by the government to fund its ambitious housing program is raising more concerns over the nation’s debt governance.】

item.title: 特朗普关税阴影笼罩，韩国银行降息提振需求
item.description: 韩国央行下调基准利率，以支持因政治动荡和唐纳德-特朗普关税计划的贸易影响而受到威胁的经济，此举受到广泛期待。【原文：The Bank of Korea cut its benchmark interest rate in a widely expected move to support an economy jolted by political turmoil and threatened by the trade impact of Donald Trump’s tariff plans.】

item.title: 苹果公司高管作证称应用商店收费可能违反法院命令
item.description: 苹果公司的一位高级管理人员作证说，苹果公司认为，当它为移动应用开发者的购买行为增加新的佣金时，存在着 "极大 "的风险，即苹果公司将无法遵守法院的命令，允许移动应用开发者引导客户使用该公司应用商店以外的支付方式。【原文：Apple Inc. believed there was a “significant” risk it would fail to comply with a court order to allow mobile app developers to steer customers to payment methods outside the company’s App Store when it added a new commission for those purchases, a senior company executive testified.】

item.title: 黄金因降息希望和避险需求增长而接近历史纪录
item.description: 由于市场对美联储最早将于 7 月再次降息的信心不断增强，同时特朗普政府对中国的最新贸易炮火也刺激了避险需求，黄金保持在最新纪录附近。【原文：Gold held near its latest record as confidence grows the Federal Reserve will implement another rate cut as early as July, while the Trump administration’s latest trade salvos against China bolstered haven demand.】

item.title: 巴菲特寻求增持股份，日本贸易公司大涨
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Japanese trading houses, including Mitsubishi Corp. and Marubeni Corp., rallied on Tuesday after Berkshire Hathaway Inc. said it was looking to increase ownership in the companies.】

item.title: 中国风险投资公司欲贷款 4 亿美元收购摇滚偶像马歇尔公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国风险投资公司洪山资本集团正在与银行谈判，以获得约 4 亿美元的贷款，支持其收购音响设备制造商 Marshall Group AB。【原文：Chinese venture capital firm HongShan Capital Group is in talks with banks for an around $400 million loan to back its acquisition of audio equipment maker Marshall Group AB, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 错过纳税截止日期的英国购房者将额外支付高达 11,250 英镑的税款
item.description: 据一份新的报告称，数以万计正在购房的英国人将错过一个关键的纳税期限，一些首次购房者将面临高达 11,250 英镑（14,226 美元）的额外费用。【原文：Tens of thousands of Britons currently in the process of purchasing a home are on course to miss a key tax deadline, with some first-time buyers facing up to £11,250 ($14,226) in extra charges, according to a new report.】

item.title: 香港将在财政预算案中应对赤字和经济增长放缓问题
item.description: 香港官员本周将公布如何解决亚洲金融之都面临的日益严峻挑战的计划，其中最主要的挑战是增长放缓和二十年来最长的连续财政赤字。【原文：Hong Kong officials this week will unveil plans on how they’ll solve the mounting challenges facing Asia’s financial capital — chief among them slower growth and the longest string of fiscal deficits in two decades.】

item.title: 中国石油茶壶受税收规定影响面临关闭威胁
item.description: 中国规模较小的独立炼油厂正受到更严格的税收制度的挤压，这可能会加速这一陷入困境的行业的停产。【原文：China’s smaller, independent oil refineries are getting squeezed by a stricter tax regime, which could accelerate shutdowns in the embattled sector.】
